description: Roselyn Sidal, Julie-Ann Guivarra and Jacqui Joseph in conversation with Tara Chetty about the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic on adolescent girls in the Pacific region. The webinar also included video messages from Natasha Stott-Despoja, Virisila Buadromo, and Yoshiko Capelle plus performance from two young women: Anna Vea and Mia Kami.
keywords: audio-visual, gender-and-youth, human-rights, pacific-girls, pacific-women, social-norms
name: Webinar: Pacific girls and COVID-19
